meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Lacquer</kanji> <kanji>container</kanji>s are called <vocabulary>Lacquerware</vocabulary>. Those pretty bowls you're eating out of? That shininess is because it's lacquerware!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
